mapper.insert: insert into member(mb_id, mb_password, mb_name, mb_email, mb_is_admin) values(#{mb_id}, #{mb_password}, #{mb_name}, #{mb_email}, 'N')
mapper.update: update member set mb_id = #{new.mb_id}, mb_password = #{new.mb_password}, mb_name = #{new.mb_name}, mb_email = #{new.mb_email} where mb_no = #{new.mb_no}
